title: Keyboard won't work in game
body: Im in a game and I can't use abilities, type in chat, use summoners etc... and yet I can use my space bar, I can get to my settings and I can right click and move around??? Can someone tell me a fix to this? I really don't know what to do. I've disconnected my keyboard, I've relogged on, I've reloaded the game several times and nothing is happening to help.

replies.body: Your settings file saved to the server may be completely borked. You can reset it by logging into the game, then heading to your install directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and deleting the folder called **Config**. Hop into a custom and let me know if this worked!
same issue, tried this and it doesnt work.
I am having the same issue, It started today and idk what to do.
